actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works.

official_title: A bill to amend the Disaster Relief Act of 1970 to permit the proceeds of certain loans to be used to construct protective measures for the prevention of future damage.

summary.text: Permits loans under the Disaster Relief Act of 1970 to be used to construct protective measures for the prevention of future damage from wind-driven water and wave action during periods of high water levels. (Adds 42 U.S.C. 4451(a)(4), 4452(4))

titles.title: A bill to amend the Disaster Relief Act of 1970 to permit the proceeds of certain loans to be used to construct protective measures for the prevention of future damage.
